effects.display_string:
Set: Your abilities have a chance to start a Winning Streak! increasing the damage of Rampage by 2%, stacking up to 10 times.
Rampage has a 15% chance to end your Winning Streak!

Set: When you gain a stack of Winning Streak! you have an even chance to either cause your next Bloodthirst to deal 15% increased damage and have 25% increased chance to critically strike or cause your next Raging Blow to deal 15% increased damage and generate 2 additional Rage.

sockets.display_string: +181 Primary Stat and +0.15% Critical Effect per unique Algari gem color

name: Test Subject's Clasps
description: Don't take 'em off - might need to identify your body.

name: Cyrce's Circlet
description: Sea dogs and tale spinners tell stories of a mythical siren that could lure even the stubbornest sailors to a watery grave.

spells.description: Equip: Your spells and abilities have a high chance to empower the Eye and grant you 353 Strength up to 20 times, decaying rapidly upon leaving combat. While fully empowered, the Eye instead deals 85,683 Fire damage to enemies or heals allies for 128,531.

name: Improvised Seaforium Pacemaker

spells.description:
Equip: Repurpose a Seaforium charge to give your heart a kick, causing your first ability every 60 sec to trigger Explosive Adrenaline, granting 3,129 Critical Strike for 15 sec.

While exploding, Critical Strikes cause you to blow up again, extending this duration by 1 sec, up to 15 times.

description: It's just crazy enough to work...

spells.description: Equip: Your gear cools with Woven Duskthread and gains 756 Versatility when over 80% health.
Equip: Your attacks have a very high chance to contaminate your target with industrial runoff up to 25 times, dealing 1,692 Shadow damage per stack every 3 sec until their demise.
Equip: You champion the causes of your guild.  All guild reputation gains are increased by 100%.
